meico.mpm.elements.styles.defs

Class ArticulationDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.styles.defs.AbstractDef
        • meico.mpm.elements.styles.defs.ArticulationDef

  • public class ArticulationDef
extends AbstractDef
    This class interfaces MPM's articulationDef elements.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
